You obtain an
IRON SWORD!
Press Z to use
it.

You obtain a

Press X to shoot
arrows.

You find a pair
of SWIMMING
TRUNKS! Now you
can swim.

You find a
SNORKEL!
Now you can go
deeper.

You obtain a
PINK SWORD!
It can break
rocks. Somehow.

You find
PINK ARROWS!
They can break
rocks. Somehow.

You buy an
EXTRA HEART!
You feel so
very healthy.

You buy a
QUIVER!Now
you can carry
more arrows.

You buy a
MASTER KEY!
It opens
every lock.

You buy a pair
of SPEED
BOOTS! Gotta
go... no.
